title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4604.2 - When amendment is allowed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4604.2 - When amendment is allowed

State Regulations

An amendment of a license may be made if the subject
matter of the amendment could properly and lawfully have been included in the
original license, and if any fee is due, it shall be paid upon the filing of
the application to amend. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4604.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
